items.title: Crib Swap [Modern Horizons 3 Commander]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3 Commander
Type: Tribal Instant — Shapeshifter
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {2}{W}
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

items.title: Apex Devastator [Modern Horizons 3 Commander]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3 Commander
Type: Creature — Chimera Hydra
Rarity: Mythic
Cost: {8}{G}{G}
Cascade, cascade, cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. Multiple instances of cascade each trigger separately.)

items.title: Archon of Cruelty [Modern Horizons 3 Commander]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3 Commander
Type: Creature — Archon
Rarity: Mythic
Cost: {6}{B}{B}
Flying
Whenever Archon of Cruelty enters the battlefield or attacks, target opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker, discards a card, and loses 3 life. You draw a card and gain 3 life.
Malice spreads on wings of tyranny.

items.title: Plains (0311) [Modern Horizons 3]

Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Basic Land — Plains
Rarity: Common
({T}: Add {W}.)

items.title: Emerald Medallion [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Artifact
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {2}
Green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
It is a sun-dappled glade in the morning, the aroma of spring's first blossoms, and the melody of birds chirping in a joyful chorus. It is life.

items.title: Deserted Temple [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Land
Rarity: Rare
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Untap target land.
A monument to long-forgotten gods, it stands as a tribute to the fleeting nature of human ways.

items.title: White Orchid Phantom [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Creature — Spirit Knight
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {W}{W}
Flying, first strike
When White Orchid Phantom enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target nonbasic land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
His oath required no service beyond death, but his honor demanded it.

items.title: Forest (0318) [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Basic Land — Forest
Rarity: Common
({T}: Add {G}.)

items.title: Bloodbraid Challenger (Extended Art) (Ripple Foil) [Modern Horizons 3 Commander]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3 Commander
Type: Creature — Elf Berserker
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {3}{R}{G}
Cascade
Haste
Escape—{3}{R}{G}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Hasal knew hunting in the Rip would be dangerous. He didn't know it would be so much fun.

items.title: Shadow of the Second Sun [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Enchantment — Aura
Rarity: Mythic
Cost: {4}{U}{U}
At the beginning of enchanted player's postcombat main phase, there is an additional beginning phase after this phase. (The end step happens after the added untap, upkeep, and draw steps.)
Live fully, then return to the beginning.

items.title: Six [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Legendary Creature — Treefolk
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {2}{G}
Reach
Whenever Six attacks, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among them into your hand.
As long as it's your turn, nonland permanent cards in your graveyard have retrace. (You may cast permanent cards from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying their other costs.)

items.title: Plains (0310) [Modern Horizons 3]

Set: Modern Horizons 3

Rarity: Common
({T}: Add {W}.)

items.title: Flare of Malice [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Instant
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {2}{B}{B}
You may sacrifice a nontoken black creature rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker with the greatest mana value among creatures and planeswalkers they control.
Suffer as I have suffered. Lose as I have lost.

items.title: Glimpse the Impossible [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Sorcery
Rarity: Common
Cost: {2}{R}
Exile the top three cards of your library. You may play those cards this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if any of those cards remain exiled, put them into your graveyard, then create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token for each card put into your graveyard this way. Those tokens have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
Gisela beheld true divinity, and was humbled.

items.title: Wurmcoil Larva [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Wurm
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {3}{B}{B}
Deathtouch, lifelink
When Wurmcoil Larva dies, create a 1/2 black Phyrexian Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 2/1 black Phyrexian Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.
Even a scrap of Phyrexian machinery can be lethal.

Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {3}{B}
Menace
When Grim Servant enters the battlefield, search your library for a card with mana value less than or equal to your devotion to black, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

items.title: Trickster's Elk [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:

Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {2}{G}
Bestow {1}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)

"Wait. Is *that* one Dad?" —Rowan Kenrith, to Will

In the Cosmos, secrets swirl and spark like windborne embers, and only Alrund can capture them.

items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Legendary Artifact Creature — Human
Rarity: Mythic
Cost: {W}{U}{B}{R}
When Breya, Etherium Shaper enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
{2}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Choose one —
• Breya deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
• You gain 5 life.

items.title: K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror Minion
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {4}{B/P}{B/P}{B/P}
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Lifelink
For each {B} in a cost, you may pay 2 life rather than pay that mana.
Whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth.

items.title: Izzet Generatorium [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Artifact
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {U}{R}
If you would get one or more {E} (energy counters), you get that many plus one {E} instead.
{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you've paid or lost four or more {E} this turn.
Hard hats are required. Shock-resistant coveralls aren't, but are highly recommended.

Cost: {7}
Prototype {3}{R} — 2/2 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Laws of nature on Mirrodin are always malleable.

It is the warm glow of the setting sun at journey's end, the scent of the evening meal crackling over a fire, and the cacophony of a raucous song shared over tankards of mead. It is freedom.

items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3

Rarity: Rare

It is a helping hand reaching out to the downtrodden, the acrid-sweet tang of burning incense during prayer, and the harmony of voices uplifted in unison. It is faith.

items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Legendary Creature — Elf Warrior
Rarity: Mythic
Cost: {1}{G}{G}
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast creature spells from the top of your library.
{G}, {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Reveal a card from your hand or the top card of your library. If you reveal a creature card this way, put it onto the battlefield. Activate only during your turn.

items.title: Flare of Duplication [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Instant
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {1}{R}{R}
You may sacrifice a nontoken red creature rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Decent. But let me show you what mastery looks like.

items.title: Kozilek, the Broken Reality [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Legendary Creature — Eldrazi
Rarity: Mythic
Cost: {9}
When you cast this spell, up to two target players each manifest two cards from their hands. For each card manifested this way, you draw a card. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Other colorless creatures you control get +3/+2.

It is the imposing heft of a ruler's scepter, the stench of death after a victory in battle, and the mournful wail of an enemy kneeling in supplication. It is power.

items.title: Detective's Phoenix [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Enchantment Creature — Phoenix
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {2}{R}
Bestow—{R}, Collect evidence 6. (To pay this bestow cost, pay {R} and exile cards with total mana value 6 or greater from your graveyard.)
Flying, haste
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and haste.
You may cast Detective's Phoenix from your graveyard using its bestow ability.

items.title: Evolution Witness [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Creature — Elf Shaman Mutant
Rarity: Common
Cost: {2}{G}
{1}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Evolution Witness, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
She remembers every breakthrough, from the gene's mutation to the new life's propagation.

items.title: Mountain (0316) [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Basic Land — Mountain
Rarity: Common
({T}: Add {R}.)

items.title: Volatile Stormdrake [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Creature — Drake
Rarity: Rare
Cost: {1}{U}
Flying, hexproof from activated and triggered abilities
When Volatile Stormdrake enters the battlefield, exchange control of Volatile Stormdrake and target creature an opponent controls. If you do, you get {E}{E}{E}{E}, then sacrifice that creature unless you pay an amount of {E} equal to its mana value.

items.title: Ral, Monsoon Mage // Ral, Leyline Prodigy [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Legendary Creature — Human Wizard // Legendary Planeswalker
Rarity: Mythic
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost 1 less to cast.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell during your turn, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Ral, Monsoon Mage deals 1 damage to you. If you win the flip, you may exile Ral. If you do, return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.
Reverse Type: Legendary Planeswalker — Ral
Ral, Leyline Prodigy enters the battlefield with an additional loyalty counter on him for each instant and sorcery spell you've cast this turn. [+1]: Until your next turn, instant and sorcery spells you cast cost 1 less to cast. [-2]: Ral deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card if you control a blue permanent other than Ral. [-8]: Exile the top eight cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells from among them this turn without paying their mana costs.

items.title: Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student // Tamiyo, Seasoned Scholar [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Legendary Creature — Moonfolk Wizard // Legendary Planeswalker
Rarity: Mythic
Flying

Whenever Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student attacks, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "2, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

When you draw your third card in a turn, exile Tamiyo, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.
Reverse Type: Legendary Planeswalker — Tamiyo
[+2]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn. [-3]: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a green card, add one mana of any color. [-7]: Draw cards equal to half the number of cards in your library, rounded up. You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size."

items.title: Witch Enchanter // Witch-Blessed Meadow [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Creature — Human Warlock // Land
Rarity: Uncommon
When Witch Enchanter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
Shilgengar's famine once starved Stensia into embracing vampirism. The Dawnheart Coven would not let the same happen to Kessig.
Reverse Type: Land
As Witch-Blessed Meadow enters the battlefield, you may pay 3 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add W.
"Ghrin-Danu will not let her people go hungry." —Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

items.title: Sorin of House Markov // Sorin, Ravenous Neonate [Modern Horizons 3]
items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3
Type: Legendary Creature — Human Noble // Legendary Planeswalker
Rarity: Mythic
Lifelink

Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay (W/B). If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, exile Sorin of House Markov, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.
Reverse Type: Legendary Planeswalker — Sorin
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay (W/B). If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) [+2]: Create a Food token. [-1]: Sorin, Ravenous Neonate deals damage equal to the amount of life you gained this turn to any target. [-6]: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a lifelink counter on it if you control a white permanent other than that creature or Sorin.

Rarity: Rare
Cost: {2}{G}
Reach
Whenever Six attacks, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among them into your hand.
As long as it's your turn, nonland permanent cards in your graveyard have retrace. (You may cast permanent cards from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying their other costs.)

items.body_html:
Set: Modern Horizons 3

Rarity: Rare
Cost: {U}{B}
Whenever Psychic Frog deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card.
Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Psychic Frog.

Some frogs poison the body. Some frogs poison the mind.

items.body_html:

Type: Enchantment
Rarity: Uncommon
Cost: {2}{R}{W}
When Scurry of Gremlins enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Gremlin creature tokens. Then you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the number of creatures you control.
Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
A whiff of aether brings the horde out of hiding.
